long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simply rejects the network requests to your most addicting websites. Once the extension is installed and turned on, Reddit, Youtube, Twitter, and Instagram will no longer be accessible. If you need to access those sites, the extension can be turned off and the web page reloaded. With the use of the this extension you can stay focused on important tasks without becoming distracted.

No charges, no data collection. The way it should be. Non intrusive software that only blocks net requests using their URL and requires no personal information. 

Try it out!
